mapper.select: SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%sqli%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%xss%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%urlredirect%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%thymeleafi%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%xxe%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%ssrf%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%pathtraversal%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%idor%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol like '%upload%';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol='fastjson';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol='cmdi';
SELECT id,name,content,url1,color FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol='shiro';
SELECT id,name,content,url FROM vulnpath WHERE symbol = #{vuln};
